messages.subject: Re: circumcision
messages.msgSnippet: Lol....what a subject! Neither my spouse nor son are cut. My spouse due to his father requesting to see one preformed and all the information on them. My son
messages.messageBody:
Lol....what a subject!
Neither my spouse nor son are cut.

My spouse due to his father requesting to see one preformed
and all the information on them.

My son due to speaking with a surgeon who specializes
who felt they are totally unnecessary.



__________________________________________________

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] circumcision
messages.msgSnippet: I think the last paragraph of that article sums up the problem.  The problem isn t that these men aren t circ d, it s that they are very promiscuous.  Sex
messages.messageBody:
I think the last paragraph of that article sums up the problem. The
problem isn't that these men aren't circ'd, it's that they are very
promiscuous. Sex isn't talked about in those cultures (I transcribe a
show that airs in Africa and they talk a lot about the AIDS epidemic
over there). They just tend to have sex with as many women as possible,
whether they are married or not.

Kristie, who has 2 uncirc'd sons

Adriana

messages.subject: circumcision
messages.msgSnippet: As a caveat Simon isn t circumcised. There is a study that as just been done showing that circumcision lowers your risk of AIDS by 70%.
messages.messageBody:
As a caveat Simon isn't circumcised. There is a study that as just been done
showing that circumcision lowers your risk of AIDS by 70%.
http://tinyurl.com/acoxu is an article on the study. Something to add to
your sons' reading.

Schuyler
www.waynforth.blogspot.com

>
same
> with not circumcising. if my boys want their penis cut they can decide
> that
> once they are able to understand and decide.
